author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Clicks Says ‍Chain Increased Sales By 14.2% In 20 Weeks To 14 Jan 2018​
text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Clicks Group Ltd:
* ‍CHAIN INCREASED SALES BY 14.2% IN 20 WEEKS TO 14 JANUARY 2018​
* ‍TOTAL GROUP RETAIL SALES INCREASED BY 13.0% AND BY 6.7% ON A COMPARABLE STORE BASIS FOR 20 WEEKS TO 14 JANUARY 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
